# LG IR TV Remote Signals, including measurement, raw signals and decoded data


Measurement:
------------
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/IvanGlinkin/Default-IR-vendors-samples/refs/heads/main/LG/TV/Samples/Measurement.png)


Decoded data:
-------------

|Button|BIN|DEC|HEX|
| ------------- | ------------- | ------------- | ------------- |
|Power|00100000 11011111 00010000 11101111|551489775|20DF10EF|
|Cable|00100000 11011111 11010000 00101111|551538735|20DFD02F|
|Text|00100000 11011111 00000100 11111011|551486715|20DF04FB|
|T.Opt|00100000 11011111 10000100 01111011|551519355|20DF847B|
